name: A Knight's Errand
description:
The King needs your help finding his crown. Just another errand for a small-time knight. 

This game pays homage to an old Flash game I found funny as a teenager (I can no longer find it, but I believe it was called Quest for the Crown). This game is meant to be short and annoying - but was a nice challenge for me to learn Godot.

Controls:

Movement - arrow keys

Navigation of Dialog/Menu Options - Arrow keys

Select Dialog/Menu Options - Enter
